SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Shelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Shelf extends Object implements Serializable
A class representing the Shelf. This class contains all the Item Cards inserted by the Player.
See Also:

    Creates a new empty Shelf.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shelf

      public Shelf()
      Creates a new empty Shelf.

      The (0, 0) position is the top left corner.

    • Shelf

      public Shelf(ItemCard[][] items)
      Creates a new Shelf based on the matrix of ItemCard passed as argument
      Parameters:
      items - a matrix of Item Cards that represents the shelf

  • Method Details

    • getCardAt

      public ItemCard getCardAt(int row, int column) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Gets the card at the provided position.
      Parameters:
      row - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file)
      column - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file)
      Returns:
      ItemCard at the provided position (if any), null otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • setCardAt

      public void setCardAt(int row, int column, ItemCard newCard) throws IllegalAccessError
      Sets the card at the provided position to the provided value.

      *************************************

      * USE ONLY ON A CLONE OF THE SHELF! *

      *************************************

      Parameters:
      row - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      column - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      newCard - the new value assigned to be set.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessError

    • getItems

      public ItemCard[][] getItems()
      Gets the items in the shelf.
      Returns:
      a matrix of ItemCards representing the shelf.

    • getCopy

      public Shelf getCopy()
      Gets a copy of this shelf.
      Returns:
      a deep copy of the current Shelf.

    • insert

      public void insert(int column, ItemCard item) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Inserts the given ItemCard in the first available row of the provided column in the shelf.
      Parameters:
      column - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      item - the card to be inserted.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the column is full.

    • getColumnLength

      public int getColumnLength(int column)
      Gets the length of the provided shelf column.
      Parameters:
      column - must be between boundaries (provided in the Constants file).
      Returns:
      length of the provided column.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Tells whether this shelf is full.
      Returns:
      true if the shelf does not have any available space left, false otherwise.

    • fill

      public void fill()
      Fills the current shelf with random Item Cards
